uCarousel

An infinite loop carousel which supports Swipe to navigate
download .ZIPdownload .TGZ

Welcome to uCarousel- GitHub Pages.

uCarousel is a swipe supported jQuery rotator which can be configured to work in a infinite loop manner.

Easy to use

Like any other plugins uCarousel is very unique!! ;) . So you just have to include jQuery and ucarousel.js. 


      <script src="/path-to-jquery/jquery.js"></script>
      <script src="/path-to-ucarousel/ucarousel.js"></script>

This is a very easy to use plugin which requires a very simple DOM structure as given below 


    <div class="ucarousel"> <!--This is the carousel wrapper-->
      <ul class="ucarousel-inner"> <!-- This is the conainer where the items/slides reside -->
        <li class="ucarousel-item"><img src="flower-1.jpg"></li> <!-- Finally here goes the items -->
      </ul>
    </div>

Blame this CSS or rather SASS for the above DOM structure. 


         //Essential
        .ucarousel-inner {
          white-space: nowrap;
          position: relative;
          padding: 0;
          * {
            display: inline-block;
            white-space: normal;
            vertical-align: middle;
            width: 100%;
          }
        }
If you don't like these class names, you are absolutely free to change them !!!. I always love to have full control of the class names and behavior(ofcourse throught configurations. Who wants to do more work.huh??) when I use a plugin. You have to only make sure that the selectors in your stylesheet should match the DOM you created.

Finally call the uCarousel with YOUR SETTINGS. 


    jQuery('.ucarousel').uCarousel(options);
